classData.comment:
/**
 * Base class for all Components which have a DOM representation
 * @class Neo.component.Base
 * @extends Neo.component.Abstract
 */
classData.description: Base class for all Components which have a DOM representation
classData.name: Base

classData.comment:
/**
     * Valid values for hideMode
     * @member {String[]} hideModes=['removeDom','visibility']
     * @protected
     * @static
     */
classData.description: Valid values for hideMode
classData.name: hideModes

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {String} className='Neo.component.Base'
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: className

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {String} ntype='component'
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: ntype

classData.description: The default alignment specification to position this Component relative to some other Component, or Element or Rectangle. Only applies in case floating = true.
classData.name: align_

classData.comment:
/**
         * CSS selectors to apply to the root level node of this component
         * @member {String[]} baseCls=[]
         */
classData.description: CSS selectors to apply to the root level node of this component
classData.name: baseCls

classData.comment:
/**
         * manager.Focus will change this flag on focusin & out dom events
         * @member {Boolean} containsFocus_=false
         * @protected
         * @reactive
         */
classData.description: manager.Focus will change this flag on focusin & out dom events
classData.name: containsFocus_

classData.comment:
/**
         * Assign a component controller to this component (pass an imported module or the string based class name)
         * @member {Neo.controller.Component|String} controller_=null
         * @reactive
         */
classData.description: Assign a component controller to this component (pass an imported module or the string based class name)
classData.name: controller_

classData.comment:
/**

classData.description: Set this config to true to dynamically import a DropZone module & create an instance
classData.name: droppable_
dropZone
dropZoneConfig

classData.comment:
/**

classData.description: True to render this component into the viewport outside of the document flow
classData.name: floating

classData.comment:
/**

classData.description: Internal flag which will get set to true on mount
classData.name: hasBeenMounted

classData.comment:
/**

classData.description: Shortcut for style.height, defaults to px
classData.name: height_

classData.comment:
/**
         * Initial setting to hide or show the component and
         * you can use either hide()/show() or change this config directly to change the hidden state
         * @member {Boolean} hidden_=false
         * @reactive

classData.description: Initial setting to hide or show the component and you can use either hide()/show() or change this config directly to change the hidden state
classData.name: hidden_

classData.comment:
/**

classData.description: Used for hide and show and defines if the component should use css visibility:'hidden' or vdom:removeDom
classData.name: hideMode_

classData.comment:
/**

classData.description: The top level innerHTML of the component
classData.name: html_

classData.comment:
/**
         * Set to `true` to show a spinner centered in the component.
         * Set to a string to show a message next to a spinner centered in the component.
         * @member {Boolean|String} isLoading=false
         */
classData.description: Set to true to show a spinner centered in the component. Set to a string to show a message next to a spinner centered in the component.
classData.name: isLoading

classData.description: Using the keys config will create an instance of Neo.util.KeyNavigation.
classData.name: keys_

/**

classData.comment:
/**
         * Make the view Responsive by adding alternative configs.
         * The definition happens via responsiveCfg

classData.description: Make the view Responsive by adding alternative configs. The definition happens via responsiveCfg
classData.name: responsive

classData.comment:
/**
         * Specify a role tag attribute for the vdom root.
         * See: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Accessibility/ARIA/Roles
         * @member {String|null} role_=null
         * @reactive
         */
classData.description: Specify a role tag attribute for the vdom root. See: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Accessibility/ARIA/Roles
classData.name: role_

classData.comment:
/**
         * Set this to true for style 'overflow:auto'.
         * Set this to 'x' or 'y' to add style 'overflow-x' or 'overflow-y' to 'auto'
         * Other than false this will add cls 'neo-scrollable'.
         * @member {Boolean|"x"|"y"} scrollable_=false
         * @reactive
         */
classData.description: Set this to true for style 'overflow:auto'. Set this to 'x' or 'y' to add style 'overflow-x' or 'overflow-y' to 'auto' Other than false this will add cls 'neo-scrollable'.
classData.name: scrollable_

classData.description: Style attributes added to this vdom root. see: getVdomRoot()
classData.name: style

classData.comment:
/**
         * You can pass a used theme directly to any component,
         * to style specific component trees differently from your main view.
         * @member {String|null} theme_=null
         * @reactive
         */
classData.description: You can pass a used theme directly to any component, to style specific component trees differently from your main view.
classData.name: theme_

classData.comment:
/**
         * While it is recommended to define tags inside the vdom of classes,
         * this shortcut enables us to change the vdom root tag on instance level.
         * Use cases: switch a Toolbar to a "nav" tag, switch a SideNav to an "aside" tag.
         * @member {String|null} tag_=null
         * @reactive
         */
classData.description: While it is recommended to define tags inside the vdom of classes, this shortcut enables us to change the vdom root tag on instance level. Use cases: switch a Toolbar to a "nav" tag, switch a SideNav to an "aside" tag.
classData.name: tag_

classData.comment:
/**
         * The top level textContent of the component
         * @member {String|null} text_=null
         * @reactive
         */
classData.description: The top level textContent of the component
classData.name: text_

classData.comment:
/**
         * Add tooltip config object or a string containing the display text
         * See tooltip/Base.mjs
         *
         * By default, a single, shared Tooltip instance is used for all widgets which request
         * a tooltip. It reconfigures itself from the widget's definition just before showing.
         *
         * If a widget needs its own instance for any reason, inslude the property `ownInstance : true`
         * in the tooltip config object.
         * @member {Object|String} tooltip_=null
         * @reactive
         */
classData.description:
Add tooltip config object or a string containing the display text See tooltip/Base.mjs

By default, a single, shared Tooltip instance is used for all widgets which request a tooltip. It reconfigures itself from the widget's definition just before showing.

If a widget needs its own instance for any reason, inslude the property ownInstance : true in the tooltip config object.
classData.name: tooltip_

classData.comment:
/**
         * Add 'primary' and other attributes to make it an outstanding design
         * @member {String|null} ui_=null
         * @reactive

classData.description: Add 'primary' and other attributes to make it an outstanding design
classData.name: ui_

classData.description: Walks up the vdom tree and returns the closest theme found
classData.name: getTheme

classData.comment:
/**
     * Hide the component.
     * hideMode: 'removeDom'  uses vdom removeDom.
     * hideMode: 'visibility' uses css visibility.
     * If hideMode === 'removeDom' you can pass a timeout for custom css class hiding.
     * @param {Number} timeout
     */
classData.description: Hide the component. hideMode: 'removeDom' uses vdom removeDom. hideMode: 'visibility' uses css visibility. If hideMode === 'removeDom' you can pass a timeout for custom css class hiding.
classData.name: hide

classData.description: Check if this component or any of its parents is floating
classData.name: isFloating
measure

     */
classData.description: Override this method to change the order configs are applied to this instance.

params.description: True prevents the instance from getting an originalConfig property
params.name: preventOriginalConfig

     * hideMode: 'visibility' uses css visibility.

classData.comment:
/**
 * manager.Focus fires the event after focusEnter, focusLeave or focusMove
 * @event focusChange
 * @param {Object} data
 * @param {Object[]} [data.path] dom element ids upwards
 * @param {Object[]} [data.oldPath] dom element ids upwards
 */
classData.description: manager.Focus fires the event after focusEnter, focusLeave or focusMove
classData.name: focusChange

classData.comment:
/**
 * manager.Focus fires the event when the component id is included inside the dom id path
 * @event focusEnter
 * @param {Object} data
 * @param {Object[]} data.path dom element ids upwards
 */
classData.description: manager.Focus fires the event when the component id is included inside the dom id path
classData.name: focusEnter

classData.comment:
/**
 * manager.Focus fires the event when the component id is not included inside the dom id path
 * @event focusLeave
 * @param {Object} data
 * @param {Object[]} data.oldPath dom element ids upwards
 */
classData.description: manager.Focus fires the event when the component id is not included inside the dom id path
classData.name: focusLeave

classData.comment:
/**
 * manager.Focus fires the event when the component id is included inside the dom id path, but the path itself changed
 * @event focusMove
 * @param {Object} data
 * @param {Object[]} data.path dom element ids upwards
 * @param {Object[]} data.oldPath dom element ids upwards
 */
classData.description: manager.Focus fires the event when the component id is included inside the dom id path, but the path itself changed
classData.name: focusMove
